participant_1.background:
My career in party planning is going well, but I'm a bit lonely since I spent my birthday alone.
I collect children's books and toys to remember my childhood.
I spend my weekends learning about the universe.
I was able to design a video game that my father could play and enjoy.
Every day is a sweet taco-filled adventure.

participant_2.background:
I like Drake's music, and my favorite color is blue.
i have a beautiful rose garden.
when i have nothing else to do , i read books.
I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
i enjoy eating italian food.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Pretty good! I just got back from the rose garden, my favorite place to relax.
Oh, that sounds lovely! I've always wanted to have a rose garden of my own.
You should! They're so beautiful and relaxing.
I know, right? I love the smell of them.
Me too! They're so fragrant.
What kind of roses do you have in your garden?
I have a lot of different kinds, but my favorites are the David Austin roses.
Those are beautiful! I've seen them in pictures, but I've never smelled them in person.
You should definitely come over sometime and take a whiff!
I'd love to!
Great! I'll have to give you a tour of my garden.
Sounds like a plan!
So, what do you do for fun?
I'm a party planner, so I usually spend my time planning parties and events.
That sounds really fun! I've always wanted to be a party planner.
It is! It's a great way to be creative and make people happy.
I bet! What's your favorite part about being a party planner?
I love seeing the look on people's faces when they see the finished product.
That's so sweet! I bet it's really rewarding.
It is! It's the best feeling in the world.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks
